# API Surface: Website feed

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| Auth API | REST | Supabase-based authentication with email/password and OAuth (Google, Apple) | src/app/api/auth/, src/app/auth/ |
| Notebooks API | REST | CRUD operations for notebooks, sources, and AI-generated outputs | src/app/api/notebooks/ |
| AI Generation API | REST | Chat with documents, generate flashcards, study guides, audio overviews | src/app/api/ai/ |
| Study Rooms API | REST + WebRTC | Collaborative study sessions with real-time video, chat, and annotations | src/app/api/study-rooms/, src/lib/study-room/webrtc.ts |
| Cloudflare Workers AI API | REST | Edge-based AI inference for embeddings, chat, flashcards, and content generation | src/lib/workers-client.ts, workers/ |
| Mobile Sync API | REST | Mobile-specific endpoints for Expo/React Native app | src/app/api/mobile/ |
